text: Great tamales, and delivery to your home! What could be better? We bought a dozen at the farmer's market and they didn't last 10 minutes in my house. Had to get a delivery of 2 more dozen!
Best Tamales in town and they even offer vegan options. Great friendly service! Check them out if you haven't done so yet.

The absolute best tamales I've ever had in my life. My wife and I get them every single farmer's market in Inspirada. The only bad thing is they don't have a restaurant I can go to more often! Arturo is also a very friendly person who sells the tamales.
